summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons memorandum from the Federal Correctional Institution dated August 10, 2019, reporting the discovery of inmate Jeffrey Epstein unresponsive in his cell at approximately 6:33 a.m. He was pronounced deceased at 7:36 a.m. after being transported to a local hospital.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was found unresponsive in his cell on August 10, 2019, and later pronounced deceased.

events.title: Discovery of Jeffrey Epstein Unresponsive
events.description: At approximately 6:33 a.m., inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell while staff attempted to serve the breakfast meal. Staff began life-saving measures, and he was escorted to Health Services by 6:39 a.m.

events.title: EMS Arrival and Hospital Transport
events.description: EMS arrived at 6:43 a.m. Institution medical staff noted circumficial bruising around Epstein's neck. He was transported to a local hospital at approximately 7:10 a.m.

events.title: Pronouncement of Death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was pronounced deceased at 7:36 a.m.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Federal Correctional Institution on August 10, 2019, at approximately 6:33 a.m.
Institution medical staff observed circumficial bruising around Epstein's neck.
Epstein was pronounced deceased at 7:36 a.m. after being transported to a local hospital.
